item.title: Neuroscience Game-Changer: Entire Fruit Fly Brain Mapped in Stunning Detail for the First Time - SciTechDaily
item.description:
1. Neuroscience Game-Changer: Entire Fruit Fly Brain Mapped in Stunning Detail for the First Time  SciTechDaily
  2. Scientists Unveil the First-Ever Complete Map of an Adult Fruit Fly's Brain, Captured in Stunning Detail  Smithsonian Magazine
  3. After a Decade, Scientists Unveil Fly Brain in Stunning Detail  The New York Times
  4. Use citizen science to turbocharge big-data projects  Nature.com
  5. Fruit flies are hard to swat. Mapping their brain might tell us why : Short Wave  NPR

item.title: British man finds fame in China after revealing gruelling 996 work schedule at tech job

item.title: Get a refurbished e-scooter 57% off and zip through the city
item.description: This refurbished Phantom A9 Standing E-Scooter is a gas-free, electric ride with a 28-mile range and 15.5 mph top speed. Get it on sale for $269.99 (reg. $629).
